segments.text: This overflowing sink is really quite a mess.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The water is just pouring relentlessly over the front of the cabinets.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I can only imagine the damage it's doing to the wood.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The veneer on those lower cabinet doors is probably already ruined.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: And the floor, it's becoming completely saturated with water.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: It just looks so unsanitary, all that water pooling everywhere.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I hate to think of the mold and mildew that could form.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: This kind of neglect is truly disheartening to witness.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The sheer waste of water is also quite irritating.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: It's an eyesore, frankly, to see such a common fixture so out of control.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The image of the serene garden outside just amplifies my feeling of discomfort.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: This kitchen is becoming a swamp, and no one seems to care.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I hope they can dry it all out properly afterwards.
segments.speaker: PAR
